snippet: When J. Dennis Hastert is arraigned in federal court on Tuesday, he will be represented by Thomas C. Green, a former prosecutor who has defended members of Congress and other public officials accused of official misconduct.
abstract: When J. Dennis Hastert is arraigned in federal court on Tuesday, he will be represented by Thomas C. Green, a former prosecutor who has defended members of Congress and other public officials accused of official misconduct.

headline.main: Dennis Hastert Hires Thomas C. Green as His Lawyer
